definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Bll the boys laughed to hear the good news.
sentences.chinese: 听见这个好动静然后，所有的男孩都笑了。

sentences.english: She does not hear him, for she is deaf.
sentences.chinese: 她耳背，听不到他的动静。

sentences.english: ABAQUS also provides a model to specify a static and akinetic friction coefficient directly.
sentences.chinese: ABAQUS还提供直接指定动静摩擦系数的模型。

sentences.english: Objective To review and summarize the effects of interventional treatment of hand arteriovenous malformation in 5 cases.
sentences.chinese: 目的回顾总结5例手部动静脉畸形的介入疗法。

sentences.english: But I woke up when I heard him in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 不过听见他在厨房里的动静我就醒了。

sentences.english: Crane people heard movement, door in.
sentences.chinese: 鹤民听到动静，夺门而入。

sentences.english: Optimum design of hybrid bearing with shallow recess is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文对浅油腔动静压轴承进行了优化设计。

sentences.english: A large movement shocked me from my morbid contemplation.
sentences.chinese: 一个很大的动静将我从这种病态的沉思中惊醒过来。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the risk factors for postoperative seizure in patients with brain arteriovenous malformation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑动静脉畸形术后癫痫发生的危险因素。

sentences.english: You continue to titillate the kid, still have no action.
sentences.chinese: 就继续挑逗这小家伙，依然没有动静。

sentences.english: Arteriovenous anastomoses are best developed in the digits.
sentences.chinese: 指趾部有丰富的动静脉吻合。

sentences.english: Yet nothing came from the bamboo seed.
sentences.chinese: 可是竹子的种子却毫无动静。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods and experience of radical therapy of central arteriovenous malformation of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下颌骨动静脉畸形的根治性治疗方法和经验。

sentences.english: Charles rode out from his camp to see what the enemy was up to.
sentences.chinese: 查理从营地骑马出来观察敌人的动静。

sentences.english: On hearing the news, the boss gave a dressing down to all those clerks that were involved in the business.
sentences.chinese: 老板听到阿谁动静后峻厉训斥了介入此事的人员。

sentences.english: The competent authority will release relevant information in due course.
sentences.chinese: 有关部分将当令发布有关动静。

definition: sound (often with negative, not a sound)/whisper
(of a sound) to come through/to be heard/(of news) to arrive
outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
to look around/to peep (through a crack)/to peer at/to throw a look at
item (in a program of entertainments)/trick (act of mischief)/worthwhile result/accomplishment/sth significant but not immediately apparent/sth more than meets the eye
